title: Listener Stories: Vol. 59
description:
Happy Zeptember! We’re here with a grab bag of creepy stories for you…or is it just Em and a collection of audio clips of Christine gasping? We’ll never tell!

So keep an eye on your rocking chair, don’t look in the mirror, and pray your boss doesn’t look at the dash cam. And that’s why we drink!
author: andthatswhywedrink@gmail.com (Em Schulz, Christine Schiefer)
